Skip to contents
obisdi 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Function reference

Create obisdi structure

Create a standard project folder with the obisdi structure. This provides the base for creating a Darwin Core mapping project.

obisdi_create()
Create an obisdi standard project
obisdi_mapping
Darwin Core mapping using RMarkdown

Adding information

Functions for adding information on the README and/or mapping Rmarkdown.

add_dwc_event()
Add Darwin Core mapping of events class to Rmarkdown
add_dwc_occurrence()
Add Darwin Core mapping of occurrence class to Rmarkdown
add_funding()
Add funding details on README and .Rmd files
add_gitrepo()
Add GitHub repo address on README and .Rmd files
add_institution()
Add institutional details on README and .Rmd files
add_metadata_readme()
Add metadata details to the README file

Adding Darwin Core mapping fields

Functions for adding Darwin Core fields into the mapping source Rmarkdown.

add_dwc_event()
Add Darwin Core mapping of events class to Rmarkdown
add_dwc_occurrence()
Add Darwin Core mapping of occurrence class to Rmarkdown

Get information

Extract information or download files from repositories.

get_figshare()
Add funding details on README and .Rmd files

Generate metadata file

Functions for generating a metadata file. See the main gen_metadata for more details.

gen_meta_geocov()
Generate metadata object for geographical coverage
gen_meta_keywords()
Generate metadata object for keywords
gen_meta_methods()
Generate metadata object for methods info
gen_meta_person()
Generate metadata object for individuals
gen_meta_project()
Generate metadata object for project info
gen_meta_taxoncov()
Generate metadata object for taxonomic coverage
gen_meta_temporalcov()
Generate metadata object for temporal coverage
gen_metadata()
Generate an EML metadata file in the XML format to inclusion in the IPT

Methods for gen_metadata objects

`-`(<meta_person>)
Select name method for the meta_person class
`+`(<meta_person>)
Select name method for the meta_person class
print(<meta_cov>)
Print method for the generate_*cov group
print(<meta_person>)
Print method for the generate_meta_person
